title: News24.com | Tutu foundation welcomes Rupert, Oppenheimer donation to combat Covid-19 impact
description: The Desmond & Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation has lauded the donation made by South Africa's most successful business families into a fund to combat Covid-19's impacts.
content:
The Desmond & Leah Tutu Legacy Foundation says the donation made by South Africa's most successful business families into a public/private sector fund to combat the impact of Covid-19 is a "wonderful affirmation of the human family that we are".
